Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are travelling along Netherworld Lane, through the Iilandi Campus.
Room.LongDescription: The Odinialli Memorial Administration Building is located on the south side of the road next to Riverdell Way. On the north side of the road, you can see the great Iilandi University Chancellor's Hallwhere most of the classes are held. The large university spans nearly three city blocks and is virtually free to students.
